page.title: 16School Activities
page.content: We hold a variety of educational visits and field trips, including the County Show, Stanley Head Outdoor Pursuits Centre, Youth Hostelling and abroad. Our school team for netball, football and cricket compete against other schools in the Staffs. Moorlands. Assemblies are held every morning and on Friday mornings each class, in turn, produces its own assembly except for once a month when House Meetings are held. There are 3 Houses, Saxon,Norman, and Viking, who compete for various academic and sporting trophies. Twice a year exams. are held and reports are sent out at the end of June. Parents Evenings are held twice a year. School plays and concerts are regularly held and once a year a school magazine is produced. An active Parent/Teacher Association provides money for the minibus and school equipment.
